text: The Law of Life () is a 1940 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Stolper and Boris Ivanov.Опальному воляЗакон жизни It stars Daniil Sagal, Aleksandr Lukyanov, and Oswald Glazunov. ==Actors== * Daniil Sagal as Paramonov * Aleksandr Lukyanov as Ognerubov * Oswald Glazunov as Babanov * Nina Zorskaya as Natasha Babanova * Elena Kondrateva as Nina Babanova * Anna Zaporozhets as Klavdiya Stepanovna * Grigoriy Shpigel as Cheryomushkin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1940 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Stolper Category:Movies directed by Boris Ivanov
title: The Law of Life (movie)
